This ornate [spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54) has a brass tube inscribed with constellations and green-tinted lens. It's often used by field astronomers to pick out greater details among stars and other celestial bodies. Like a typical spyglass, you can see eight times farther while looking through a _stargazer's spyglass_.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** You are viewing the night sky with the spyglass; **Effect** You set your eye upon a star and think of someone to cast [_guiding star_](/Spells.aspx?ID=923).
